LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosureNonrecurri.label: Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure, Nonrecurring (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosureNonrecurri.description: Aggregation of the liabilities reported on the balance sheet measured at fair value on a nonrecurring basis by the entity.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Guaranteed Benefit Liability, Gross
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts, as of the balance sheet date.

LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Payment for Benefits
LiabilitiesForGuaranteesOnLongDurationCo.description: Amount of cash outflow to policyholders and contract holders for guaranteed minimum benefit payments.

LiabilityForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExp.label: Liability for Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
LiabilityForClaimsAndClaimsAdjustmentExp.description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefits.label: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, before Reinsurance
LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefits.description: Amount, before effect of reinsurance, of present value of future benefit to be paid to or on behalf of policyholder and related expense less present value of future net premium receivable under insurance contract.

LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsAndUnpai.label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits and Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefitsAndUnpai.description: The aggregate amount of policy reserves (provided for future obligations including unpaid claims and claims adjustment expenses) and policy benefits (liability for future policy benefits) as of the balance sheet date; grouped amount of all the liabilities associated with the company's insurance policies.

LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Business Acquisitions
LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the cost of settling unpaid claims after deduction of reinsurance recoveries related to the acquisition of a business. Includes, but is not limited to, claims which have been incurred but not reported.

LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Claims Paid, Current Year
LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle claims incurred in the current period and related claims settlement costs.

LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Claims Paid, Prior Years
LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle claims incurred in prior periods and related claims settlement costs.

LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Incurred Claims
LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process.

LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Net
LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.description: Liability as of the balance sheet date for amounts representing estimated cost of settling unpaid claims under the terms of the underlying insurance policies, less estimated reinsurance recoveries on such claims. This includes an estimate for claims which have been incurred but not reported. Claim adjustment expenses represent the costs estimated to be incurred in the settlement of unpaid claims.

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapa.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Borrowing Capacity
LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapa.description: Maximum borrowing capacity under the credit facility without consideration of any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed or the amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

LoansInsurancePolicy.label: Loans, Gross, Insurance Policy
LoansInsurancePolicy.description: Amount before allowance of loans made to policy and contract holders using their life insurance contracts' cash value or separate accounts as collateral. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums over and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, after Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LossContingencyAccrualInsuranceRelatedAs.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Insurance-related Assessment, Premium Tax Offset
LossContingencyAccrualInsuranceRelatedAs.description: The amount of insurance-related assessment liability that is expected to be recovered through a premium tax offset based on current laws applied to in-force policies.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstate.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate
MortgageLoansOnRealEstate.description: Amount of investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCarryingAmountO.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Carrying Amount of Mortgages (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCarryingAmountO.description: The carrying amount of the outstanding balance due under the mortgage loan.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Commercial and Consumer, Net
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCommercialAndCo.description: The balance represents the amount of loans that are secured by real estate mortgages, offset by the reserve to cover probable credit losses on the loan portfolio.

NetAmountAtRiskByProductAndGuaranteeSepa.label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Separate Account Value
NetAmountAtRiskByProductAndGuaranteeSepa.description: Value of the separate accounts corresponding to the specified product, guarantee type and subset of the guarantee.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetInvestmentIncome.label: Net Investment Income
NetInvestmentIncome.description: Amount, after investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherAsse.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Other Assets Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherAsse.description: Amount of assets, classified as other, acquired in a noncash or part noncash acquisition.

NotesAssumed1.label: Notes Assumed
NotesAssumed1.description: The fair value of notes assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

NotesReduction.label: Notes Reduction
NotesReduction.description: The value of notes retired (or transferred to another entity) in noncash investing or financing transactions.

OperatingLeaseCost.label: Operating Lease, Cost
OperatingLeaseCost.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, Additional Credit Losses
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which a previous OTTI was recognized and the investor does not intend to sell the debt security and it is not more likely than not that the investor will be required to sell the debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, No Previous Impairment
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which no such other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was previously recognized.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Credit Losses on Debt Securities Held
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: The cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Securities Sold
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security because of the sale of impaired securities during the period.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Recognized in Earnings
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security, recognized in earnings.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses on equity securities, OTTI related to credit losses on debt securities, and OTTI losses on debt securities when the entity intends to sell the securities or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the securities before recovery of its amortized cost basis. Additionally, this item includes OTTI losses recognized during the period on investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Available-for-sale Securities
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment losses on investments in debt and equity securities categorized as Available-for-sale which have been recognized in earnings during the period. Such impairment losses consist of other than temporary impairments (OTTI) on equity securities, credit losses on investments in debt securities, and when the entity intends to sell an impaired debt security or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the impaired debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

ParticipatingPoliciesAsPercentageOfGross.label: Participating Insurance, Percentage of Gross Insurance in Force
ParticipatingPoliciesAsPercentageOfGross.description: Percentage of participating insurance contract to insurance contracts in force.

PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Claims Paid
PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromPolicyLoans.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Policy Loans
PaymentsForProceedsFromPolicyLoans.description: Net amount paid or received by the entity associated with issuance or collection of loans made to policy holders, principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

PensionContributions.label: Payment for Pension Benefits
PensionContributions.description: Amount of cash outflow for pension benefit. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree. Excludes other postretirement benefit.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredGro.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Direct
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredGro.description: Amount, before effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderDividends.label: Policyholder Dividends, Expense
PolicyholderDividends.description: Amount of expense for dividends to policyholders.

PolicyholderFunds.label: Policyholder Account Balance
PolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholder. Includes, but is not limited to, unpaid policy dividend, retrospective refund, and undistributed earnings on participating business. Excludes future policy benefit and claim expense.

PremiumsAndOtherReceivablesNet.label: Premiums and Other Receivables, Net
PremiumsAndOtherReceivablesNet.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date, net of allowance for doubtful accounts, of all premiums and other types of receivables due from other persons or entities.

PremiumsEarnedNet.label: Premiums Earned, Net
PremiumsEarnedNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

PremiumsWrittenNet.label: Premiums Written, Net
PremiumsWrittenNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums written.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAddi.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Addition from Acquisition
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAddi.description: Amount of addition for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense, Accrued Interest
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization expense for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from accrued interest on unamortized balance.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense, Assumption Change
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from assumption change.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense, Realized Gain (Loss)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from realized investment gain (loss).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Five
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Four
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year One
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Three
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Two
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnre.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investment
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnre.description: Amount of unrealized investment gain (loss) which decreases (increases) present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Parent
ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.description: The cash inflow from parent as a source of financing that is recorded as additional paid in capital.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses, Net of Cash Divested
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.description: This element represents the cash inflow during the period from the sale of a component of the entity.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForTradingSecurities.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Trading Securities, Short-term
ProceedsFromPaymentsForTradingSecurities.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from sales and purchases of trading securities.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.label: Proceeds from Sale, Maturity and Collection of Investments
ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale, maturity and collection of all investments such as debt, security and so forth during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

RealEstateInvestments.label: Real Estate Investments, Net
RealEstateInvestments.description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.

ReinsuranceCostsAndRecoveriesNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Assumed and Ceded
ReinsuranceCostsAndRecoveriesNet.description: Amount of recovery (expense) related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies assumed and ceded.

ReinsuranceRecoverableCreditLossExpenseR.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ReinsuranceRecoverableCreditLossExpenseR.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid and amounts expected for incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss
ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SaleLeasebackTransactionAccumulatedDepre.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Accumulated Depreciation
SaleLeasebackTransactionAccumulatedDepre.description: The accumulated depreciation and amortization related to the asset(s) sold in connection with the property sold to another party and leased back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsFin.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Gross Proceeds, Financing Activities
SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsFin.description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Net Book Value
SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue.description: The net book value of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and lease back to the seller.

SecuredBorrowingsGrossIncludingNotSubjec.label: Secured Borrowings, Gross Including Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
SecuredBorrowingsGrossIncludingNotSubjec.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of financial assets loaned to entities in exchange for collateral and funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a financial asset repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same financial assets at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesBorrowed.label: Securities Borrowed
SecuritiesBorrowed.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesBorrowedAmountOffsetAgainstCol.label: Securities Borrowed, Amount Offset Against Collateral
SecuritiesBorrowedAmountOffsetAgainstCol.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral offset against an obligation to return collateral under a master netting arrangement. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesBorrowedGross.label: Securities Borrowed, Gross
SecuritiesBorrowedGross.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesLoaned.label: Securities Loaned
SecuritiesLoaned.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstColla.label: Securities Loaned, Amount Offset Against Collateral
SecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstColla.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral offset against a right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedGross.label: Securities Loaned, Gross
SecuritiesLoanedGross.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesLoanedIncludingNotSubjectToMas.label: Securities Loaned, Including Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement and Assets other than Securities Transferred
SecuritiesLoanedIncludingNotSubjectToMas.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of financial assets loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and financial assets transferred other than securities that qualify as secured borrowings.

SeparateAccountAssets.label: Separate Account Asset
SeparateAccountAssets.description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

SeparateAccountsLiability.label: Separate Account, Liability
SeparateAccountsLiability.description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends available for payment after computation of statutory restrictions on capital surplus.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

SubordinatedLongTermDebt.label: Subordinated Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
SubordinatedLongTermDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of collateralized/uncollateralized debt obligation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion. Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind the primary lender of the company.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Amount
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Amount of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Cost
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Cost of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: Current Year Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred in the current reporting period and related claims settlement costs.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Benefit, Claim, Loss and Settlement Expenses
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.description: Amount of insurance benefit, claim, loss and settlement expenses incurred, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Loss, Claim and Loss Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.description: Amount of reserve for future policy claim payable and loss expense to be incurred, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Net Investment Income
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.description: Amount of net investment income earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherOp.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Operating Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherOp.description: Amount of operating expense classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Policy Claim and Benefit Payable
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.description: Amount of claim and benefit payable classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Premium Revenue
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.description: Amount of premium revenue earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SurplusNotes.label: Surplus Notes
SurplusNotes.description: Financial instruments issued by insurance entities (surplus notes) that are includable in surplus for statutory accounting purposes as prescribed or permitted by state laws and regulations that are liabilities of the issuer.

TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Valuation Allowance
TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.description: Amount of valuation allowance pertaining to the deferred tax asset representing potential future taxable deductions from tax credit carryforwards for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

TradingSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
TradingSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

TradingSecuritiesDebt.label: Debt Securities, Trading
TradingSecuritiesDebt.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLo.label: Trading Securities, Change in Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss)
TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLo.description: Amount of unrealized holding gain (loss) recognized in the income statement for investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

TransferOfInvestments.label: Transfer from Investments
TransferOfInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred from the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

TransferToInvestments.label: Transfer to Investments
TransferToInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Net
ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Reporting Entity Involvement, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for more than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Accumulated Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Accumulated Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position without allowance for credit loss.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Accumulated Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Number of Positions
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedAm.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedAm.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.label: Loss Contingency, Estimate of Possible Loss
LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.description: Reflects the estimated amount of loss from the specified contingency as of the balance sheet date.

CreditDerivativeMaximumExposureUndiscoun.label: Credit Derivative, Maximum Exposure, Undiscounted
CreditDerivativeMaximumExposureUndiscoun.description: Maximum potential amount of future undiscounted payments that could be required under the credit derivative, before reduction for potential recoveries under recourse or collateralization provisions.

CreditRiskDerivativesAtFairValueNet.label: Credit Risk Derivatives, at Fair Value, Net
CreditRiskDerivativesAtFairValueNet.description: Fair value of credit risk derivative asset after deduction of credit risk derivative liability.

DerivativeAssetCollateralObligationToRet.label: Derivative Asset, Collateral, Obligation to Return Cash, Offset
DerivativeAssetCollateralObligationToRet.description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements offset against derivative assets.

DerivativeLiabilityFairValueOfCollateral.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value of Collateral
DerivativeLiabilityFairValueOfCollateral.description: Fair value of securities pledged as collateral against derivative liabilities.

LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.label: Litigation Settlement, Amount Awarded to Other Party
LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.description: Amount awarded to other party in judgment or settlement of litigation.

NumberOfCreditRiskDerivativesHeld.label: Number of Credit Risk Derivatives Held
NumberOfCreditRiskDerivativesHeld.description: Number of credit risk derivative instruments held.

SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.label: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Amount Offset Against Collateral
SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price offset against an obligation to return collateral. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DeferredTaxAssetsInvestments.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Investments
DeferredTaxAssetsInvestments.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from investments (excludes investments in subsidiaries and equity method investments).

DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnAvail.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Unrealized Losses on Available-for-Sale Securities, Gross
DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnAvail.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses on available-for-sale securities.

DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnTradi.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Unrealized Losses on Trading Securities
DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnTradi.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses on trading securities.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinancingReceivableOriginatedFiveOrMoreY.label: Financing Receivable, Originated, More than Five Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedFiveOrMoreY.description: Amount of financing receivable originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedFourYearsBe.label: Financing Receivable, Year Five, Originated, Four Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedFourYearsBe.description: Amount of financing receivable originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.label: Financing Receivable, Year One, Originated, Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.label: Financing Receivable, Year Two, Originated, Fiscal Year before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.label: Financing Receivable, Year Four, Originated, Three Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.description: Amount of financing receivable originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.label: Financing Receivable, Year Three, Originated, Two Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.description: Amount of financing receivable originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Other Investments
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and maturity (principal being due) of other investments, prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.
